ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: i would recommend the course for those interested in inflammation as a unifying concept in immunity and disease.
Yes, I would recommend this course to anyone whose research project involves any aspect of inflammation.
I would recommend it to hammer down inflammation.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: it deepened my understanding of the basic concepts of inflammation and how they can work underlyingly in other disease settings.

This coursehas expanded my knowledge of the immune response to injury and other chronic changes in physiologic homeostasis. This course has helped shaped my current research and has helped in forming future research questions to pursue.
It was useful to learn more about inflammation in an abstract manner.
